name: 4CKids
0:
”Alexa, open four c. kids”
”Alexa, ask four c. kids for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start four c. kids”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: four c. kids
des:
Come back each week to listen to the new message. 4C Kids is the children's ministry of Four Corners Church. We create safe, fun, and engaging environments to partner with parents in raising kids who love Jesus. We offer classes for infants through 4th graders that meets during each service at Four Corners Church. Our services are at 9:15 & 11:00 am at 7740 Service Center Drive, West Chester, OH 45069. 

You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
